column4: Hello!  If my ipod will not mount after installing the restricted extras package and the ipod plugin for ehaile.  Is there something I am missing or have overlooked?
Is the driver loaded? Did you reboot since you installed the new module?
I did not reboot yet.  Do I also need ffmpeg from synaptic?  It says that ugly and bad gstreamer are installed, but not ffmpeg
which driver?   Maybe I should reboot first if you think that will help
